Section.name: About SVR Engineering College
Section.description:
SVR Engineering College, Kurnool is a private college established in 2007, affiliated with JNTU, Anantapur, and approved by AICTE, UGC, and MHRD. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology and Management across multiple specializations.
Admission to the college is made based on the performance of the candidates in the state-level entrance exam. The college has a dedicated and facilitated Training & Placement Cell that provides placement assistance to its students through recruitment drives. The top recruiters are IBM, Wipro, Accenture, TCS, Cognizant, Infosys, TechM, Mindtree, Capgemini, FIS, MTX, DXC Technology, Legato, CGI, Qspiders, and many more.

Check: SVR Engineering College Kurnool Faculty
Ques. What is the application procedure at SVR Engineering College, Kurnool?
Ans. Candidates can apply to the SVR Engineering College online mode on the official website of the college by filling out the application form with the required details and paying the application fee.
Ques. What are the facilities provided by SVR Engineering College, Kurnool?
Ans. SVR Engineering College has state-of-the-art infrastructure which provides various facilities to the students such as modern classrooms, a well-stocked library, laboratories, a computer lab, hostel facilities, a cafeteria, sports, and much more.
Ques. What is the hostel fee at SVR Engineering College?
Ans. The accommodation fee at the SVR Engineering College hostel is INR 40,000 per year. The college provides hostels for both male and female students.
Check: SVR Engineering College Kurnool Hostel
Ques. What is the fee structure for B.Tech. and M.Tech. courses at SVR Engineering College, Kurnool?
Ans. The fee structure for B.Tech. courses are INR 38,600/- per annum and the fee structure for the M.Tech. course is INR 35000/- per annum.
Ques. Which domain of SVR Engineering College has received the highest package?
Ans. For the year 2023, SVR Engineering College has released its placement data. As per the reports, the ECE branch has received the highest package of INR 7 LPA offered by TCS. Further, the CSE and Mechanical branch has got an offer of INR 4.5 LPA from Accenture and NN Techno Pvt. Ltd.
